com.ucsf.core.services

Class Services

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ucsf.core.services.Services

  • public abstract class Services
extends java.lang.Object
    Definitions of methods and class to homogeneize calls to services.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Services.Provider
      Service provider interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Services

        public Services()

    • Method Detail

      • getProvider

        public static Services.Provider getProvider(ServiceId id)
        Returns the service provider for the given unique id. Because the underlying map is not consistent through different entry points, this method can return null even if the service exists.

      • getProviders

        public static java.util.Collection<Services.Provider> getProviders()
        Returns the registered service providers. Because the underlying map is not consistent through different entry points, this method can return only a subset of all the running services.

      • startServices

        public static void startServices(Settings settings,
                                 Services.Provider... providers)
        Starts the given services.

      • areServicesEnabled

        public static boolean areServicesEnabled(Context context)
        Indicates if services are enables, i.e. if they are launched on startup.

      • enableServices

        public static void enableServices(Context context,
                                  boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables services.

      • stopServices

        public static void stopServices()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Stops all the running services.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
